RegGenoLab Retreats


The Regulatory Genomics and Bioinformatics Laboratory is focused on designing and developing bioinformatic approaches to unravel and study genomic regulatory mechanisms, with a strong emphasis on identifying genetic variants that could disrupt such mechanisms.


PI: Alejandra Medina-Rivera

Country: Mexico

University: UNAM

Department: LIIGH


This space is to track RegGenoLab Retreats
